attributes.action: Make tax returns of party political leaders a requirement
attributes.additional_details:
It is imperative that p[arty leaders be trustworthy. 

Full declaration of tax affairs is therefore essential.

The populace must have confidence that political leaders follow the laws we all follow.
attributes.background: Every leader of a political party in the UK should be required to reveal all of their tax returns for the previous 5 years - not just income, but all items

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about this are a matter for political parties themselves, not the UK Government or Parliament.
